puakma.system
Class pmaSystem

java.lang.Object
  puakma.system.pmaSystem
All Implemented Interfaces:
ErrorDetect
public class pmaSystem
extends java.lang.Object
implements ErrorDetect

This is the System class which should act like the glue to hold all the pieces together. This class should never be garbage collected and should live as long as the server is running. Code started: June 13, 2001 Brendon Upson
